purpose.title: 1. Purpose of Personal Information Collection and Use
purpose.description: Glimpse (hereinafter "the Company") collects and uses personal information for the following purposes to provide anonymous matching services:

items.registration: Member registration and management: Identity verification, identification for membership services
items.matching: Anonymous matching service provision: Group-based interest expression and mutual matching
items.payment: Payment and settlement: Payment for premium service fees, purchases and billing
items.improvement: Service improvement: New service development and customized service provision
items.security: Prevention of fraudulent use: Prevention of identity theft and fraudulent transactions

retention.title: 3. Personal Information Retention and Use Period
retention.description: The Company processes and retains personal information within the personal information retention and use period according to laws or the personal information retention and use period agreed upon when collecting personal information from the data subject.

items.payment: Payment information: 5 years according to E-Commerce Act
items.verification: Identity verification information: 6 months according to Information and Communication Network Act

thirdParty.title: 4. Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties
thirdParty.description: The Company does not provide users' personal information to external parties in principle. However, exceptions are made in the following cases:

items.consent: When users have given prior consent
items.legal: When required by law or by investigative agencies according to procedures and methods specified by law for investigative purposes
items.payment: When necessary for payment processing (PG companies: Toss Payments, Kakao Pay)

items.realName: Real names not disclosed until mutual matching
items.company: Company verification information used only for verification purposes
items.location: Location information used only for finding nearby groups, no personal location tracking

destruction.title: 6. Destruction of Personal Information
destruction.description: The Company destroys personal information without delay when it becomes unnecessary due to the expiration of the personal information retention period or achievement of processing purposes.

methods.electronic: Electronic file format: Permanently deleted in an irrecoverable manner
methods.paper: Paper documents: Shredded with a shredder or incinerated

rights.title: 7. Rights of Users
rights.description: Users can exercise the following rights at any time:

items.correction: Request correction if there are errors

rights.exerciseNote: Rights can be exercised through the settings menu in the app or customer service.

reports.title: If you need to report or consult about other personal information infringement:

items.prosecutor: Supreme Prosecutors' Office Cyber Investigation Department (www.spo.go.kr / 1301)
items.police: National Police Agency Cyber Safety Bureau (cyberbureau.police.go.kr / 182)

changes.title: 9. Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.description: This privacy policy is effective from January 1, 2025, and if there are additions, deletions, and corrections to changes according to laws and policies, they will be announced through notices 7 days before the implementation of changes.
